title: Crude Oil Advances as China Pledges to Support Growth Next Year
description: Oil ticked higher on prospects for improved Chinese demand, and as commodities staged a strong end-of-year rally.
content: Oil ticked higher on prospects for improved Chinese demand, and as commodities staged a strong end-of-year rally.
